name: Basic-Wall-Holzfassade_Hinterlüftet_Laibung-2906806
material_entries: Massivholz Fichte / Tanne / Lärche, kammergetr., gehobelt
Massivholz Fichte / Tanne / Lärche, kammergetr., gehobelt, Produktion Schweiz
reason: part of a facade, implicating individual boards
as nadelholz is a material indicator, fichte/tanne/lärche fits
kammergectrocknet has better control over shrinkage, therefore better for precise fassade system
gehobelt is preffered over rau, since it is visible fassade panel
kammergetrocknet, gehobelt is industry standard for wooden nadelholz facade boards
